name: GlitchGr√°fico / GraphicGlitch
description: This work presents a graphic and personal interpretation of Glitch effect applied to my own identity. The original work was produced on a 40x40x2cm canvas, with spray paint and stencils, and photographed to create this NFT. Created during the pandemic period COVID-19, 2021 - Brazil.
